BUY.description: Buy a piece of ship equipment

FITTING_IS_INCLUDED_IN_THE_PRICE.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship

FLAVOUR_0_BODY.message: Witam! Nazywam się {name} i sprzedam {equipment} z mojego starego rzęcha. Chcę za to {price}.

FLAVOUR_1_BODY.message: Cześć! Nazywam się {name}. {equipment} - mam to w posiadaniu i jest prawie jak nowe. Sprzedam to za jedyne {price}.

FLAVOUR_2_BODY.message: Greetings! I'm {name} and I have a very fine {equipment} which could be yours for just {price}.

FLAVOUR_3_BODY.message: Hello! I have an extra {equipment} which I need to get off my hands, my asking price is {price}.

FLAVOUR_3_TITLE.message: NA SPRZEDAŻ: {equipment} - w bardzo dobrym stanie.

FLAVOUR_4_BODY.message: Hi! We have an extra {equipment} which could be yours for {price}.

FLAVOUR_4_TITLE.message: NA SPRZEDAŻ: {equipment} - ostatni egzemplarz, stan dobry.

FLAVOUR_5_BODY.message: Greetings! Do you want to buy my old {equipment}? It has served me well, but I have now upgraded and don't need it. The price is {price}.

HOW_DO_I_FITT_IT.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship
